### Review resources for students 
- [Seeing Theory](https://seeing-theory.brown.edu/) - A website from Brown University that visualizes some of the key ideas from statistics in an interesting way.
- [MIT OCW](https://ocw.mit.edu/courses/18-05-introduction-to-probability-and-statistics-spring-2022/) - A free *Introduction to Probability and Statistics* course from MIT.
